page.description: Get the value of a IEEE floating point number from the blob.
page.original:
.PEEKN() Syntax Floating_Point_Value as N = .PEEKN( Position as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position of the floating point number.
Description The .PEEKN() method returns the value of an IEEE 8 byte floating point number at a Position in a blob. The first position is 1. Example b1 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\claire_081003.jpg") ? b1.peekn(10) = 2.67009e-307
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
